PublicKeyCredentialParseCreationOptionsF.summary: The parseCreationOptionsFromJSON() static method of the interface converts a {{glossary("JSON type representation")}} into its corresponding publicKey create credentials options object structure.

remarks.para: The method is a convenience function for converting credential options information provided by a relying party server to the form that a web app can use to create a credential.

PublicKeyCredentialParseCreationOptionsF.returns: An object with the Web Authentication API publicKey create credentials options object structure.
